definition: to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: We cannot let humans pay for our mistakes .
sentences.chinese: 我們不能讓人的總稱爲我們的錯誤而償命。

sentences.english: Return to money if you borrow it, you must dead if you kill someone.
sentences.chinese: 借錢還錢，殺人償命這是天經地意的事。

sentences.english: Life for life, he will be sentence to death.
sentences.chinese: 以命償命，他將被判處死刑。
他想讓貝拉特里克斯爲此償命。

sentences.english: The forest family member reprimands the police again and again, the request "pays with a life by the life".
sentences.chinese: 林的家人一遍又一遍地申斥警方，要求“以命償命”。
